article_text: Park officials at the Ozark National Scenic Riverways in southern Missouri describe the conflict as resource management versus recreation. Environmentalists want a stronger crackdown. Locals say it’s just more government intrusion.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Ozarks, park, rivers, riverways, Obama, government, intrusion, Ozark National Scenic Riverways
article_metadata.title: Planned restrictions don’t float with fans of Ozark rivers | The Kansas City Star

article_summary:
Park officials at the Ozark National Scenic Riverways in southern Missouri describe the conflict as resource management versus recreation.
Locals say it’s just more government intrusion.
Environmentalists want a stronger crackdown.
